title: Sum Of
text: Here you write the amount in words so no one can easily change it.  Example: “Fifty Dollars Only”.

title: Amount in Numbers
text: The same amount written in digits. Example: $50.00.

title: Acc. No( Account Number)
text: Shows from which account the money will be taken.

title: Please Sign Above
text: The cheque is valid only if the account holder signs here.

title: MICR Code
text: (Numbers at the Bottom): These special numbers are read by bank computers to know details like bank branch and account. Think of it like the cheque’s secret barcode.
